DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of pentatonic live music on physiological parameters in preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effects of Live Music in Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Gestational age 2634 weeks; no use of CPAP (Continous Positive Airway Pressure) or any other form of mechanical ventilation; signed informed consent of the parents Heart defect or known cardiac arrhythmia; other diseases of the preterm and newborn period (including infections and chromosomal aberrations) which make an additional diagnostic and therapeutic intervention unacceptable; detection of deafness (TEOAE, transitory evoked otoacoustic emission)
DOC.keyword: Preterm infants, music, Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU)
